name: Manic Meltdown
description:
# Introducing Manic Meltdown!

--

## How To Play

Keep the power plant's needs balanced for 3 minutes to win! Keep an eye on the computer screen in the middle to see which sections of the power plant need your attention!

You're the head honcho at a radically active power plant. Your job is to stop the joint from exploding at all costs. Pull any lever, stomp any switch, and repair any damage to keep the place stable or else you're fired. Oh and watch out for the toxic slime, your insurance doesn't cover that.

--

## Controls

Use the arrow keys to run left and right. Hold up or down to climb ladders. Press spacebar to jump.

--

## Background Info

This project was made for Ludum Dare #49. It's a contest where you have a weekend to make a game. The theme was "unstable". The engine used was Unity.
